CustomField.formula: ISPICKVAL( Implementation_Fee_Type__c , 'Fixed Fee') || ISPICKVAL( Implementation_Fee_Type__c , 'Capped Time and Materials') || ISPICKVAL( Implementation_Fee_Type__c , 'Software Live') || ISPICKVAL( Milestone_Payments__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Performance_Parent_Bank_Guarantees__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Performance_Parent_Bank_Guarantees__c , 'Yes - On Request') || ISPICKVAL( Liquidated_Damages__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Fixed_Date_Retention__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( High_Risk_Scope_Inclusions__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Service_Credit__c , 'Yes - High Risk') || ISPICKVAL( Cloud_Service_Credit__c , 'Yes - High Risk') || ISPICKVAL( Future_Functionality__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL( Termination_for_Convenience__c , 'Yes - High Risk') || ISPICKVAL( Termination_for_Deemed_Material_Breach__c , 'Yes - High Risk') || ISPICKVAL( Non_Standard_Warranties__c , 'Yes - High Risk') || ISPICKVAL( Non_standard_Liability_Cap_2X__c , 'Yes - High Risk') || ISPICKVAL( Media_Press_Statements__c , 'Customer permitted - T1 gagged')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calculated in accordance with any high risk register items on this contract
CustomField.label: High Risk
